docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows a heart with tachycardia.
docs.snippet: This animation shows a heart with tachycardia.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the use of balloon angioplasty to open a narrowed coronary artery lumen caused by deposits of plaque.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the use of balloon angioplasty to open a narrowed coronary artery lumen caused by deposits of plaque.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows a coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) procedure in which a portion of vein is grafted on the heart to reroute blood from a blocked section of a coronary artery.
docs.snippet: This animation shows a coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) procedure in which a portion of vein is grafted on the heart to reroute blood from a blocked section of a coronary artery.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows a catheter being inserted into the heart where alcohol is injected causing the swollen ventricle wall to shrink.
docs.snippet: This animation shows a catheter being inserted into the heart where alcohol is injected causing the swollen ventricle wall to shrink.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows a Directional Coronary Atherectomy (DCA) procedure performed to remove the blockage from the coronary arteries by a tiny spinning cutter that slices away plaque lesions and stores them to be withdrawn.
docs.snippet: This animation shows a Directional Coronary Atherectomy (DCA) procedure performed to remove the blockage from the coronary arteries by a tiny spinning cutter that slices away plaque lesions and stores them to be withdrawn.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation depicts how certain ingested foods can cause regurgitation of the stomach’s contents back into the esophagus resulting in the sensation of heartburn. The relationship between the location of the esophagus and heart is shown in a front view of the body.
docs.snippet: This animation depicts how certain ingested foods can cause regurgitation of the stomach’s contents back into the esophagus resulting in the sensation of heartburn. The relationship between the location of the esophagus and heart is shown in a...

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation describes the regulation of the pituitary gland and the hormones it releases to regulate various organs and processes in the body.
docs.snippet: This animation describes the regulation of the pituitary gland and the hormones it releases to regulate various organs and processes in the body.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the effects of hypertension on a cerebral artery.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the effects of hypertension on a cerebral artery.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows an enlarged view of femoral bone marrow containing immature specialized white blood cells (lymphocytes) and depicts their maturation and migration into either B cell or T cell lymphocytes.
docs.snippet: This animation shows an enlarged view of femoral bone marrow containing immature specialized white blood cells (lymphocytes) and depicts their maturation and migration into either B cell or T cell lymphocytes.
